title: Data Structures
description: The fundamentals of compute science. Learn every data structure you need to ace your college DS classes or coding interviews.

routes.title: 🚀 Course Introduction
routes.description: An overview of the coffeeclass.io data structures course.

routes.title: 👶 Arrays
routes.description: Learn the most fundamental data structure and how to use it. We create an array, add data to it, and access that data in Java, JavaScript, and C#.

routes.title: 🔗 Linked Lists
routes.description: Learn Singly Linked Lists, Circular LL's, Doubly LL's, and how to use them. We'll finish by solving a common interview question: reversing a linked list.

routes.title: 📚 Stacks
routes.description: What's a Stack ADT? Learn what stacks are, the benefits, and how to implement them using an array and a linked list in this module.

routes.title: 🎢 Queues
routes.description: Queues, Deques, and Priority Queue ADT
